definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: garlic;—pl. [[שׁוּמִים]] Nu 11:5 (J) (allium sativum, Linn, Thes Löw:No. 336 Post:Hast. DB ii. 110 Tristr:NHB 448 (or allium Ascalonicum, cf. Buhl, after Tristr:FFP 430; v. this and Post:Flora 789 for many kinds of allium); Ar. sulaymah;un, Aram. [[תּוּמָא]], tuwmo0, As. šûmu).
